answers.answer: Baby due March 17th ,4th baby , My bp is 141/71 dr scared the shiz out of me, then she let me know I will be taking 3 hour fasting glucose test cause my non fasting result was 175 (yikes) also I was told that my placenta is low, any tips, diets, experience with this sorts thing? Please let me know

I'm due march 17th. I am high risk for preterm labor. I start my progesterone shots this week. If I make it to 36 weeks I will  be delivered then via c section since Dr's do not want me going into labor due to the fact that I have a classical incision from my last emergency c section.  Also as of right now my placenta is anterior.  If it doesn't  move by delivery it will make for a more risky  c section.  This is my 3rd pregnancy.  First was  born at 38 weeks 2nd was at 25 weeks. Here's hoping the shots work and I can carry till 36 weeks.  I'm at 16 weeks right now
I am due March 9th and I am high risk due to being diabetic.
I have high blood pressure. Diabetes. Delivered last baby at 32 weeks. I have a small tear behind my placenta and since i am ober 35 by a year

I'm 19 + 1 and I have a high risk pregnancy , because I have a bicornuate uterus and because I have thrombophilia . Had 2 previous miscarriages at 10 weeks and another one at 4 , really excited to be almost half way because this baby is a blessing for me and my husband . Good luck to all of you ladies xx

Im high risk due to being diabetic. Everything seemed to be going great but a few days ago my OB called me into his office to tell me I had high AFP levels so my baby is at an increased risk of having spina bifida. I go for a level 2 ultrasound on Monday to find out for sure. Praying all is well with my little babe.

question: Anyone have been told you are High Risk, or already having issues with bp etc... Post here maybe we can help eachother through this stress.
title: High Risk Pregnancy -March 2017 Babies!
